extension.summary: Обликът "Titan MOD BETA for Kodi Matrix" за MediaPortal адаптиран за Kodi, с много добавени функции.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD BETA for Kodi Matrix Skin portiert für Kodi mit jeder Menge neuer Funktionen und einer vollständigen MediaBrowser Integration.
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
El skin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix de MediaPortal, portado a Kodi y enriquecido con muchas funciones.
Perustuu MediaPortalin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix-ulkoasuun.
L'habillage Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix de MediaPortal adapté à Kodi et enrichi avec de nombreuses fonctionnalités
המעטפת Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix שבמקור נוצרה עבור MediaPortal, שודרגה ביכולות רבות ושילוב מלא של MediaBrowser.
MediaPortal Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix presvlaka prebačena na Kodi i obogaćena s puno dodatnih mogućnosti.
La skin di MediaPortal Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix arriva su Kodi arricchita con molte feature e piena integrazione di MediaBrowser
MediaPortal'o Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix teminė išvaizda perkelta į Kodi ir papildyta daugybe funkcijų bei pilna MediaBrowser integracija.
Kulit Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix MediaPortal diport ke Kodi ditambahbaik dengan pelbagai fitur.
De Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrixskin van MediaPortal is geconverteerd naar Kodi en verrijkt met talloze functionaliteiten
Skóra Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix przeniesiona z programu MediaPortal do Kodi wzbogacona o dodatkowe funkcje.
A skin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix portada do MediaPortal para o Kodi foi enriquecida com várias funcionalidades.
Обложка Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix была портирована с MediaPortal на Kodi и обзавелась множеством новых возможностей
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix маска MediaPortala портована за Kodi обогаћена са доста карактеристика.
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix maska MediaPortala portovana za Kodi obogaćena sa dosta karakteristika.
MediaPortal'ın Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix dış görünümü, pek çok özellikle zenginleştirilerek Kodi'ye aktarıldı.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix 皮肤富含大量的功能。
